ğŸ’¡ HOW THIS HELPS

Why Kids Protocols Matter

For ADHD/Autism Parents:

  • Reduces cognitive load of remembering routines
  • Provides structure when executive function fails
  • Prevents decision fatigue during high-stress moments
  • Creates predictability for neurodivergent kids
  • Manages guilt by having "good enough" standards documented

For Co-Parenting:

  • Reduces conflict through clear expectations
  • Provides consistency across two households
  • Documents routines for smooth handoffs
  • Creates communication boundaries
  • Tracks what works and what doesn't

For Kids:

  • Predictable routines reduce anxiety
  • Clear expectations prevent confusion
  • Smooth transitions between houses
  • Consistent structure = more fun time
  • Less time spent on logistics = more quality time

Remember: You donâ€™t have to be perfect. You just need to show up, follow the protocols, and be present. The structure handles the rest.
